content.detailedDescription:
Last night (aug 26, about 11pm idaho falls, idaho) i was outside on the chaise lounge trying to cool off, and enjoying stargazing, when a movement caught eye almost directly above my head, i did a double take and tried to wrap my brain around what i was seeing.  at first i thought it was some huge, grey bird, then realized that unless it was a jurassic park resident it wasn't a bird.  it was silently gliding in a straight line from north to south, completely silent, and i had no way of judging how high it was, how large it was, or what it was.  it was a pale grey, triangle shaped something, that slightly blending into the sky but had obvious hard outlines, and was moving at at amazing speed.  i followed it until it just disappeared after a few seconds.  i still didn't have a clue what i'd seen, but knew it was something that was not from our airport,(that shuts down at 7pm) or a lost flock of birds or early migrating geese, (all of which i am familiar with. )it was almost like a mirage that was blending (but not succeeding) into the sky.  it had no undulations, just a line along the wings like a straight edge.I didn't waver, or move up and down, or jerk.  it was like it had faded in, glided silently and very quickly above me, then faded out or moved out of sight.  i ran into the house and called for my adult son to some outside, i'd just seen a ufo (by that time in my mind, i had) he laughed and i almost had to pull him out.  he followed me out (with a remark about senility) and we stood and looked up for a few minutes.  i was pretty sure it was gone.  suddenly i heard him say, "what the f**k is that!) and he was pointing up and in the same direction i had seen it.  it was coming back about the same direction (a bit different trajectile) and was as clear as when i'd seen it before.  he was freaking out and repeating what he'd said before. my son and i saw others (or the same one, circling) about 6 more times over the space of about 45 minutes.  i finally went in the house because i thought they were gone.  my son went back outside later and saw it once more.  i didn't see it again and went to bed.  he came in later and said that he thought it was birds because he'd seen some birds flying above the streetlight and they were close and he thought that might have been what we saw, only flying higher.
that is absolutely not what we saw.  it was surreal,strange, beautiful, and not anything i could identify with as anything else.  it wasn't airplanes or birds, or weather balloons or atmospheric  anomalies
!  i've seen all those things in all conditions for 65 years and i know when i see what i see.  in my mind it was either one craft coming back several times or several crafts following each other.  the first ones i saw were smaller  (or higher) than the next ones.  the 6th and last one i saw was larger than the others, it veered sharply to the right and out of sight, but on that one i saw very clearly several large, round,  but dim lights under each wing.  the 'whatever they were's' blocked the stars as they passed in front of them.
what did i see? i have no idea.  i'd like to believe they were alien in origin, but have no idea.

could there be a  simple,worldly explaination? of course, but whatever they were, it was breathtaking, frightening, and awsomely wonderful. i truly think i saw something special, and alien.  we are a few miles from inel, so maybe they keep an eye on it?  government stuff?  who knows.
i made a picture of the best way i can remember it looked.  still so frazzled by it i probably have forgotten details that i wish i could remember better.

i just talked to my daughter who lives about a mile from me, and she and her entire family saw it, almost identical story (it was too late to call me she thought, and was afraid i'd think she was crazy)now we are all freakin'out!
content.summary: Clearly saw unusual, unbelieveable night sky objects

content.detailedDescription: Six red/orange orbs plus one blue orb moving north at approx. 300-400 mph, three in diamond shape, the rest in loose formation.
content.summary: Six red/orange orbs plus one blue orb moving north at approx. 300-400 mph

content.detailedDescription: We were driving home from a friends cottage near otisville, mi around 9:00pm on aug. 20, 2011.  it was dark outside since we were in the country driving home.  we looked up in the sky and noticed a group of lights up in the sky which were reddish orange in color.  there were about 12-15 of these objects all in a staight line and then the line started to descend.  at first we thought they were a group of balloons up there tethered to a wire, but they were all so straight and then they descended downward.  they were not moving.  they were steady. we continued driving toward them and trying to figure out what they were.  we opened up the window and listened, but heard nothing.  we kept observing them, but there was no change.  we were not sure what they were up in the sky.  another couple were following us in their car and later on we followed them home and asked them if they noticed the objects in the sky and they said that they did. we all remarked "what were they?"  none of us had any idea of what they could have been.  we all said that they must have been ufo's.  it was the strangest sight any of us had ever seen.
content.summary: They were round in shape and were reddish-orange in color.

content.detailedDescription: On my way to the port for mooring, i looked up to the sky to check on the sun, since it was around 7.30 int the evening i wanted to check how much time i had left to be able to moor the boat before it got dark. at first glance i spotted what i thought was the sun, than i looked again. the sun was already covered by land from my position, there was what looked like a bright round solid cloud textured object with a trail. it was far away maybe at the same height an airplane would fly. it appeared to be static but when i looked again it had moved. not sure if it was a ufo or a comet or something.
content.summary: Round cloud like textured object with a trail

content.detailedDescription: August 27th, 2011 at 11:40 pm i went outside to smoke a cigarette and looked up at stars. a movement caught my eye and i saw a flying object pass over my house it was moving quite fast but i could clearly see a grey boomerang shaped craft with dim lights along the "wings". i called for my husband (the window was open)he came running outside, along with both my teenage daughters. i was really freaked and they did not believe me... then another one passed by and they almost peed there pants! they all saw! we were all stupefied, we kept watching and we saw 3 more in a half hours time. it was like a fleet, they were all going in the same direction. they were very big and 3 to 4 hundred feet up in the sky, they made no sound, they were all greyish- not transparent but not dark solid either, they had dim lights along the edges and they moved in a flat straight path, they moved very fast,we could only see them for about 30 seconds once they appeared (out of nowhere)then they were out of sight. we all knew what we were seeing we talked about birds, but my husband is a life long bird watcher and hunter- he dispatched that notion quick. birds don't fly that high and be seen,especially at night. they don't have lights and visible solid space between them, they fly with the wind current and you can see them moving up and down and their wings flapping. these crafts were all flying steady and straight- no fluctuating. no way they were a planes or helicopters- no flashing lights- no sounds and they just did not even slightly resemble planes or helicopters! if you were to witness what we saw, there would be no doubt in your minds that we witnessed a ufo...
content.summary: It was like there were a fleet of them, i saw 5 go directly over my house about 5 min apart. they were grey almost translucent with dim lights. wedge shaped almost like bird formation but you could see that they were solid between the lights. big

content.detailedDescription: High school reunion at bonita golf course.  outdoor venue listening to band.  many people saw these lights.  i tried to capture on my cell phone camera but they don't show well.  there were literally 50 + of these things in the sky doing various formations: arc of maybe 10 or 12, then reformating into triangles, diamond shapes.  as the moved south across the sky they seemed to just dissapear all in the exact same area of the sky.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Several red/orange orbs appear to be rising from over sweetwater reservior, made several formations, formed a line then rearrange to triangles and diamond shapes.  general movement from north to south and dissappearing into the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: We were pulling a horse trailer west bound on i80. saw what i thought was an airplane with it's lights on flying very low and headed directly toward us. we were comming up a hill and the lights were about 1-2 miles in the distance and just above the hill we were climbing, it almost looked like a very bright street light right on top of the hill we were driving except it was too bright and a little to high to be a street light. as we got closer it became apparent that it was moving too slowly to be an airplane. as we got closer we saw that is was large triangular shaped craft drifting over the road way from southwest toward northeast. it made no noise and it had 2 green pulsating lights on either side that did not appear to be attached to the craft. the lights looked to be about 10 feet off to each side. it had bright lights pointing forward attached to the forward point of the triangle and lights along the back line of the triangle. i slowed down to about 5-10 mph and passed directly under the craft as it drifted over the road,  i then pulled to the shoulder and watched it disappear behind the tree tops. it looked to be 200-300 feet high and became out of sight when it passed over the trees along the edge of the roadway. there were other vehicles on the road that had to see it but we were the only ones to slow down and pull over to the side to get a better look.
content.summary: Saw lights pointing east above i80 northern nj. large hovering triganle over road as we drove under it.

content.detailedDescription:
Riverside parkway in non-residential area in western district, unobstructed skies with relatively low treeline, complete panoramic view from open field. multiple (5) witnesses, not acquaintances, also seen object. we two watching stars & meteors and also spotting satelites too. completely clear, warm night and absolutely no wind, even breeze on the river.

spotted object as emerged from treeline on the east, keeping level altitude low, only few hundred feet and travelling to dead west in straight line. object flew slowly almost rotating until directly in front of us in center of view but acelerating ever faster and changing direction toward nw again in straight line and again to dead north. object became blurry over horizon after 20-25 seconds and began to rise and fade.

no noise at all, no lights. looked almost white but in the dark. seemed like changing shape from below but clearly disc shape from side with small central tip underside. 

all five witnesses nervous and some nervously laugh but we two saw immediately and could not explain what we saw and so watched as much as possible. not balloon! no wind tongiht, very warm and still summer night, object accelerated and kept low from one horizon to another.
content.summary: Dark disc-like object completely silent, flying low changing course & acelerating

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
We moved to oxford county 3 months ago and saw a large asprin sized red/orange orb come up out of the tree line the first week in our new house. it then made it's way across the valley and faded out of sight. since then, we have been watching the sky at least 3 nights a week in our hottub for 1-3 hours a night. 

every night there have been multiple star like objects. we have observed the orbs flashing like a lighter 1-4 times, getting progressively brighter at some points looking like a motorcycle headlight, moving at various speeds, directions and heights in a straight line or a curve strobeing in patterns and suddenly blinking out of view. normally the most activity is between 9pm - 11pm. however, we have seen orbs as early as 8pm before sunset while letting our dogs out. 

there have now been 5 bright orbs ranging in from the size of an asprin to a large pea that come over the tree line very close to our house, and almost directly above us. they are the lowest orbs we have seen and the one last night slowly came over the cliff behind us, hovered for about 20 seconds then acending about 2,000 ft before beginning to slowly make its way east across the valley. about 2/3 of the way across the valley it blinked out. there were also 2 (very obvious) planes in that section of the sky. 

about an hour later, around 10:20pm, we saw a very large slow moving craft fly from the south east to the north west. we didn't see it until it was over the west side of our house, almost out of view. it was in view for about 1 min because it was moving very slowly before it went over the tree line. it was a faint bar shape with 3 pea sized dull white lights and a very small randomly strobeing red light in the middle. it was about an inch long at an arms length, and flying sighlently very low. my husband was trained in the army to identify any type of aircraft, and he was genuinely astonished by this one.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple ufo's for the last 3 months. last night was report worthy.

content.detailedDescription:
Dear sirs,
as the daylight ended, i heard several noises from different directions  around my home, in the area struck by unforeseen rainfall in teresopolis on january 12th, 2011, thus the sighting ocurred a bit more than a month after the climatic event.
i was scared to death as i though there was a group of looters preparing an attack, and i was alone. i shouted out that there was nothing valuable to be taken. later on i came to know there were military. they obviously knew about the event and were preparing the site for what seemed to me to be a "party"!!
i prayed and accepted my death was soon coming by the hands of looters. but as the full moon rose, they, the visitors, became more visible. 
it was the most beatiful sighting i ever had. i could not count them, maybe more than one hundred beings were playing and swinging on the pine trees on my land. i felt extremely honoured to host an "alien party" on my plot of land. there were beings of different sizes and forms, but most were of human-like forms. 
at a certain moment, one of them descended in a bright ball of light at something between 10 and 20 meters of my kitchen window, and stood upright in front of two men dressed in military uniforms. i guess the were communicating (or trying to) by telepathy. they stood there for something between 30 to 60 mins. the whole district was still out of electric power, added to this, the event itself makes a human being distort the notion of time.
there were soldiers very well disguised in a bush in front of my kitchen window, i asked them if i could go outside, if that would affect my physical integrity or disturn the ongoing event... not a sound ... i then dared to go outside and sit on a rock 5 meters from my kitchen door, i noticed they became shy and froze their swinging in the trees. i chanted the mantra om, which was told to me as being the sound of the universe and one of god's names, they bacame a little less shy and resumed their swinging in the trees. i felt i should go back in, as i did not want to disturb the "party", which carried on for several hours. i felt safe, and extremely honoured to host this event, i just didn't like it that the military did not contact me, but this seems to be their normal procedure...
the following morning there were a few (about 4 or 5) military trying to wipe away any possible trace the visitors might have left, but one cannot glue a broken tree... 
the event ("party") repeated the next night, just as beatifull as the previous night...

yours sincerely,
p.
content.summary: Peacefull, astonishing, very shy, control over fog / mist

content.detailedDescription:
The information below was summitted by stephen cox, chief field investigator for ny mufon, i recieved an e-mail with the information below:

hi my name is joe. i live in stony point,ny 
this evening i saw something i can't explain. i was driving down central highway towards the stony point post office and i saw 5 lights in the sky. 

3 of the lights made a triangular shape with an additional 2 lights on either side. 

the lights together in shape. i pulled in to the post office with my friend who was with me and we got out to look. we watched 3/5 lights disappear and that left one back light and the light on the point. 

they continued to stay together than the tip light disappeared. the last light turned slowly towards the west and moved away until it disappeared. 

the lights were big, very noticeable xenon colored lights. i have never seen anything like that in my life.
content.summary: I saw something i can't explain.

content.detailedDescription:
August 24th 2011

saw a strange cloud in the sky when looking at other surrounding clouds, this strange cloud formation resembled that of a streak (much like a jet trail) but was not dissipating merely hanging in the sky. i kept my eye on the cloud as i was heading to work this was aprox. 12:35 pm. when out from the corner of a larger cloud formation i saw a white object move very rapidly behind a cliff obstructing my view. my first thoughts were "possibly a plane or big bird" but no bird could be that big and no plane could be that small. i kept my eyes on the sky hoping to catch a second glance when i rounded the cliff, to my suprise the object made an abrupt u turn and headed back the way it came. i could make out much of the shape and details, it is as follows. 

partially white, partially metallic ( it was reflecting in the sun) no wings, no props, no emission and no sound. the object was somewhat of a circle maybe egg shaped but not quite as drastic. it made very straight flight patters save for the u turn, it was moving at a very considerable pace, but was easy to track. 

i followed the object in the sky, all the while driving which was reckless but i couldn't take my eyes off of it. the object seemed to wax and wane almost disappearing in broad daylight then it quickly went behind the cloud it emerged from and did not resurface on the other side, it was gone.

i later talked with a friend of mine who was tell me about his job as a grounds keeper in aspen glen (a gated community near carbondale). he said while he was working, the lightning alarm sensors (used to alert the avid golfers to move from the course due to lighting strikes) were all triggered at aprox. 12:30. he made the remark that not a cloud in the sky looked even dark and it was a beautiful day. i then shared my sighting with him and he was astonished.
content.summary: A small white/sliver object glided from behind a strange cloud formation, before pulling a u turn and gliding back to the cloud it came from behind. object was a spherical almost oval shape, with no wings, propellers, rutters, no emission, and no sound

content.detailedDescription: It was may 1997. the sun had already set. it was a saturday or sunday evening as i recall (i wasn't working that weekend so i remember it was an off day).  i was in backyard of my parents house in collierville, tn (where i lived at the time) just to get some air. i looked up and southward and saw object traveling very slowly.  there were lots of trees so i saw it as it traveled from behind one tree out into the open and then went behind trees again as it moved strait from east to west at about 20 - 30 mph maybe.  way too slow for plane and it certainly didn't look like plane. just a big wing with the huge round lights that could have been 20 to 30 or more feet in diameter perhaps. it was huge with wing span of maybe 1 to 2 football fields.  it was right in front of me.  it was about a week before memorial day so at first i thought it may have been a b2 stealth bomber on it's way for an air show in memphis perhaps. but it only took about a half second for me to realize that wasn't the case. it was way too slow and it was also way to low to be in flight pattern for approach to memphis airport 11 miles away. i felt stupid afterwards that i was mesmerized by it but i never saw anything like that and never heard of anything like that.  also it was completely silent. i didn't own a camera and if i did it was over so fast i did not have time to run and get it. several weeks later, while in break room at work, i saw a usa today newspaper with article about ufo over phoenix.  it was the same story that art bell broadcasted.  i heard the broadcast that night when it happened in phoenix but that was a couple months before my sighting and no one was sure what it was.  in the article i saw a computer generated drawing and it was almost exactly what i saw in collierville only what i saw had wing angle that was much more shallow than the one pictured in usa today newspaper but that was the object. it was more chevron shaped and not like a v.  more like the chevron on my uniform when i was in navy. i was never able to tell anyone for fear of ridicule. all these years later i was obsessed with it and finally searched youtube and then on discovery website where i finally found couple who saw this object as well and it was during so called "lights over phoenix" incident that had happened a couple months before in arizona.  this is the video.  computer illustration starts at about 2:04 in the video and they describe it.  i also research other stories and have concluded there were military flares that night but they were a separate incident than the ship seen by these people.  (you tube link moved to investigators field) cms 08/27/11 09:00 flg
content.summary: Black, chevron shaped. 5 lights(huge round lights looked flouescent) under wings.  one light under nose, one midway on each wing and at ends

content.detailedDescription: I'm at home staying up late as usual when i look through the open shutters of my living room to notice a flying red light about half a mile away. it was hovering over a neighbors farm. they have dozens of cows in my small texas city and my home is surrounded by them from the west, nw, n, and ne. for about two seconds i thought it was a plane or a helicopter but i quickly noticed that it was silent. i live near many small airports so i know exactly what a plane, helicopter, even chinooks sound like. my neighborhood is very quiet. it is not fully developed and we have tons of empty lots so we're not a big group. i instantly go into a mode that i've never been in before and i document the time to 2am. it is extremely dark in my town at night. we are away from the big cities so it was very hard for me to see the shape of the object. i could only make out the lights. there were a few colors flashing but sometimes there would only be a red light, not flashing, just still and in the shape of a line. i watched this object for 10 minutes before i grabbed my binoculars and then for 35 more minutes. sometimes a house would be in the way, but it would always rise back up. it flew pretty low. if i saw a plane flying that low i'd expect it to crash. i was just very freaked out by the flight pattern. it would sometimes fly straight up or straight down or stay still or fly away or fly straight towards my way, but it would change patterns quickly. for the most part, it was circling in the air about 2-3 miles away, very near the local airport. i wish i was good at figuring out how large it was or how high it was and i also wish that i could've gotten a better look at the shape of the object. even with my binoculars, it was difficult to see. i could only make out its lights because they were so easily noticed. the object did not disappear or give off any light explosions when it went away. it just simply went away. it started moving east till i could no longer see it. about 20 minutes later i hear a helicopter fly over and i saw a plane flying at the appropriate altitude and the usual flight pattern. so, that really confirmed that i did not see an airplane or helicopter and i'm definitely considering buying night vision binoculars.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I noticed a stationary light, maybe 1/2 mile from home, in the sky above one of the local farms.

content.detailedDescription: I was laying on my sisters car at 1:30 a.M. (central time) on the the 27th of august on a clear night. as i was looking at the stars suddenly three triangle objects materialized and flew silently from the east and headed north at the same altitude that small planes or helicopters would normally fly at. they were huge and flying in a triangle pattern.... if i were to hold my thumb up at arms length they were about as big as a basketball....Massive! each craft had 3 orange amber lights, one on each point, and the lights were constant but also seemed to leave a trail as they flew. the event lasted 2 mins and they left as quickly as they appeared.
content.summary: There were 3 triangular objects that appeared out of nowhere flying in a triangle pattern...

content.detailedDescription: So i went to let my dogs outside, it was at 11:10 pm on friday august 26 th. the temperature was 77 degrees.  i had a flashlight looking to make sure there were no raccoons in back yard before i let dogs out. the sky was perfectly clear you could see tons of stars.  just as i stepped outside a brilliant bright light shot over head. the only way i could think to describe it is a rainbow colored fireworks being shot sideways. then it kind of shot from west to east and i dont know, kind of fizzled out?  but made a popping sound when it did. maybe 5 minutes or so later there was a plane around not sure they saw it. so thinking somehow it was a firework i decided to search twitter to see if anyone was talking about it. i found 2 people who also saw it at same time in different locations than me. im in portland oregon and one was in gresham and the other in eugene.   either of those areas are close. so fireworks theory gone. maybe weather related? but like i said perfectly clear skies 77 degrees with humidity of like 50% i think it said? anyway it was beautiful light show no matter what?
content.summary: I went to take dogs outside and saw beautiful lights in sky!  ufo?

content.detailedDescription:
Approximately 11:30pm, while sitting in reclining lounger on porch, at home, surfing on iphone while occasionally  glancing up for periods hoping to catch a meteor, i looked up to see a normal aircraft about 70 degrees eastward, heading from a ne to s direction.  i then noticed a large (perhaps twice, maybe three times size of passing original aircraft),totally silent object "floating" to the right of the plane. the distance from the aircraft was maybe two outward held "fist- lengths" from the plane.    initially i thought "whoa, really large bright satellite pass!", but immediately realizing that it was too late in evening to view any passes.  and it was larger than the iss.  object path was, for lack of better word, " meandering".

  i then tried to justify object being an airplane, and again, quickly dismissed the thought due to the following:  it had absolutely no sound.  there were no airplane lights - the white illumination was  steady, no fluctuation at all. and even if one considered that my view could have been from odd angle, the largeness of object dictated that i would have had to see the airplane strobe.  it was floating uncannily slow, in no particular flight path and was not blimp-shaped. in fact. would be hesitant to actually assign a shape. while watching it wander so impossibly slow and while trying to make up my mind what i was looking at, i saw some faint led-like red flashes randomly coming from object.  these faint red strobes occurred several random times, as i watched.

while i watched it move in a slow, irregular flight path, in a northerly direction, i turned on the iphone camera but was unable to capture image. i thought, "well heck, it's moving so slow, i'll run in the house and grab the binoculars", which were just a few feet from the back door.  however, returning back to the porch, the object was absolutely gone.  this was not possible, given rate of speed and direction heading, it absolutely could not have travelled from my field of view.  i am very confident of this fact.   i thouroughly scanned the sky,  then ran to thru the house out the front door, in order to view the eastern and northern horizon ( central texas horizon - no obstructed horizon view) the night was clear, no haze.  on this kind of evening i'm able to easily view up to 2.6 mag. and  a bit fainter  satellites.  however after scrutinizing every inch of sky, even looking through binoculars, even veiwing whar i knew to be stars & planets; i kept thinking that i would see it fading to a faint point into the distance. illogically, the object had completely vanished from the sky.  lest the investigator thinks otherwise, i spend countless hours viewing sattilite passes, studying the night sky, and watching for meteors. so, i am not quick to jump to conclusions concerning objects that i see:  i am not going to mistake jupiter ( it had not even risen yet), or a sattilite flare for a " flying saucer".   this object was impressive and may well have been a new military creation, but it certainly was not following any of the rules with which i am familiar.
content.summary: Exceedingly slow large object. lit white, and faint slow and random led-like red blinks

content.detailedDescription: At 11:11 pm on evening of august 26th my son and i were driving home when we both notice disc shaped ufo above and about a 1-2 mile in front of us and it descended at 45 degree angle down to earth at 2,000 mph plus ... 10-15 times faster than any plan i had ever seen. whole thing lasted 1-2 seconds. the vehicle was as bright as the moon and seemed to be emitting a blue /greem light from underside or belly of ufo. it appear to land in the woods to the left of use but there was not sound, not crash, no nothing other than it disappeared into the woods. i have always believed that the possibility of ufo's existed...Now after experiencing what i witnessed tonight...I have no doubt ufo's exist.
content.summary: My son and i both saw a disc shaped vehicle as bright as the moon desend rapid to earth 20x faster than a plane.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside around 11 pm & noticed what at first i thought was a plane, it had red lights and was definitely noticeable.  however, as i continued to look at it, i realized it wasn't moving at all & it also had blue, green & yellow lights, pulsating.  the lights were going around in a circle.  you could see it with the naked eye, but especially well with binoculars.  it stayed in the same spot for at least 45 minutes, then gradually went further west & below the tree tops from my vantage point.  then, i noticed another, with the same pulsating lights north of me.  this one was also stationary, but did sometimes move, very gradually west, then back east.  it was still there when i went to bed at 3 am.  i also observed a very large triangle formation southwest of this new one- one at the top and two at the bottom making up the bottom of the triangle shape.  that all took place on thursday, 8.25.11.  tonight, i specifically looked to see if they were there & they were, several.  there was one that was especially bright, the same pulsating lights.  tonight, however, this object appeared to zip around when viewed through binoculars, almost creating a "ribbon" of rainbow lights, like if you whipped a ribbon around in the air, all kinds of loops, etc.  it was there for hours.  i also asked my neighbors to look & they had never seen anything like this & agreed it was not a plane, a star, a satellite.  it didn't move, but it must have, as it seemed to once in a while be farther away.  if you didn't know what you were looking for & stare at it w/o binoculars, you could easily dismiss it as a plane or a star.  you definitely won't think that when you look through binoculars.  i never lost sight of the object.  my arm got tired from holding the binoculars.  i'm hoping someone can investigate this with far better equipment than i have.  i just have a feeling they will be back tomorrow.  i'd love someone to bring a high-powered camera to capture evidence of this thing to show experts.  this is truly unexplainable and since they did move, cannot be stars.  not to mention stars don't look like this, nor do they change shape & zip around in the same spot (if that makes any sense) forming rainbow light ribbons.
content.summary: This is a multi-night event- 2 nights in a row, rainbow colored, pulsating lights.

content.detailedDescription:
Witness contact fi adam mason on august 27, 2011 via email. i, adam mason fi 10332, am submitting his account as this could be a crashed or a landed ufo. 

    last night(8/26/2011) i was outside locking my truck up and my neighbor told me about an extremely bright beam of light shining through a window in her house that 
she noticed through her curtains about 30 minutes prior to my walking outside. initially, i tried to ignore her, which is typically easy since her house is about 50 yards 
from my own and upon a small hill. however, she just wouldn't stop trying to get me to check it out from her vantage point so i walked up to her house and sat out on her 
2nd story deck waiting for the lights to reappear. i didn't see anything for several minutes but in the mean time i noticed a dozen planes fly over the area in a matter of about 5 minutes; which to me is an unusually high amount of air traffic, as i frequently "star gaze". sure enough though after several minutes i, too, saw this incredible, bright flash of a greenish-blue color. no beam, just a super bright flash that went away in seconds. after seeing this flash two more times in orange and white, my brother, neighbor, and myself decided to drive through our small town to see if we could get a closer look. upon arriving at a local gas station approximately 1 mile away we noticed one police officer and a hazmat coordinator(who is also the chief of the fire dept.) looking at the same light that was now more than a mere flash. the lights were now located across the valley and about halfway up a small ridge, only accessible by an old logging road, and it had become six to eight smaller flashing lights which were red,blue, green and white and aligned in what looked like a semi-circular pattern.There was also a small amount of smoke coming from the scene, but not as much as you would typically see from a brush fire; and the amount of smoke also fluctuated with time. we asked the officers what they thought it could be and the hazmat guy said "no power lines had been reported down by ku" and "he wasn't sure", while the uniformed policeman jokingly said, "maybe it's e.T. with a blow torch". both of which seemed to be more than a little stumped by this situation. there were also 6 other people who we talked to that confirmed the bright flashes. for the next 2 1/2 hours the three of us sat in the parking lot of this gas station and kept our eyes fixated on these lights which were now randomly flashing the colors i mentioned, but were dimming and then emitting powerful beams into the sky and through the trees in all directions periodically, and even went completely dark on 3 or 4 occasions. there was also a clearly audible "humming" sound coming from the area, that made more of a "wah-wah-wahhh" sound. there were power lines stretching in front of the lights that were completely visible due to the bright flashing of the lights and they appeared to be intact.The strangest thing to me though was we could spot a single light traveling up the logging road, which took about 30 minutes to get from the bottom of the hill to around the vicinity of these brighter lights, but before this light could get all the way up there, it promptly turned around and came back down in a matter of minutes.  dogs were also barking incessantly through this whole experience.  after the lights finally quit flashing about 3 hours in, the lights went totally dark for about 20 minutes, at which time all the other spectators left, and then a single small,white light reappeared that was too bright to look at directly without causing pain or discomfort. we witnessed all of this through a pair of binoculars but due to the trees on the hill side the only thing we could clearly see was the colors and pattern of the lights. the police came back several hours later and told us it was, "in fact", a downed power line that had been arching and causing the bright flashes. soon thereafter a ku truck came by, circled a short back road off ky-38, and left again without fixing this alleged down power line.

 also, this morning(8/27/2011) at about 9:00 am while on my way to class at the local community college i saw four ku trucks parked at different spots on ky-38, just parked there, sitting with no one doing any kind of work to power lines. only a single person in the truck, the driver. also in the gas station parking lot were two white ford pick up trucks with the standard diamond shaped nfpa chemical hazard label, unfortunately, i did not think to stop by and take down the numbers within the diamond. there were so many things about this situation that didn't make sense to me and cause me to question it all. here are a few of my most relevant questions:

 
can a downed power line create a beam of light so bright that it can be seen in a house through the curtains, one mile away?
 
if it were a transformer that exploded, would it not create a single bright flash of a single color and then go dark? why would the lights continue to reappear and go black?
 
why would several blinking lights consolidate into one solid light?
 
if it was a downed power line, and ku knew about it, wouldn't they be obligated to fix the problem immediately? it could have potentially caused a forest fire. 

 
in this area, small storms cause localized blackouts frequently, yet there was no blackout to be seen anywhere near this downed power line or blown transformer. why?
 
what was the loud humming sound? 
 
why would ku trucks be parked on the side of the road, but not have anyone working on the power lines?
content.summary: Multiple lights coming from a hillside, and a small amount of smoke. lights were flashing solid beams into the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east bound on telegraph canyon road at approximately 8:00pm (august 26th 2011) and then turned left (ne) on paseo ladera when directly up in the sky i viewed two lights heading north east with no blinking lights only two constant white lights (side by side about 20 to 30 feet apart, and as i came up to park at home it had traveled another two to three miles north east and then i lost it as it went past my line of sight and dipped beyond the horizon line... it stood out because it was flying perpendicular to the normal flight paths going in and out of lindbergh field...
content.summary: Side by side lights about 30 feet apart....

content.detailedDescription: I was in the passenger seat on the way to a store. i saw the object and watched it thinking it looked kind of strange but figured it was probably just a strange angle on a helicopter or an airplane. it was  far enough away that i wouldn't have been able to hear anything as we were also near a freeway. i then watched it literally drop out of the sky leave a white vapor trail and a small cloud that once we parked i could no longer see.
content.summary: Silver round disc

content.detailedDescription:
duration-7:15pm-8pm approximate
on the night of november 15th, opening day of deer rifle season, the year 1997, i was camped out in my van about a mile across from the cellular phone tower outside of deep water mo. it had snowed slightly in the early morning hours, barely an inch. the daytime temp. was in the teens. after a fruitless day of hunting i retired to my van to grab a bite to eat and warm myself with some hot coffee. as it gets dark by 5:45pm, i was just sitting in the van in a pull in, facing a growed up field, imagining that a big buck would cross into my view. the old boy i was after. as one has nothing much to do but plot out the next days plans, i was just thinking of my game plan. while looking out my side window through leaves near a tree i was parked next to, i noticed some lights in the distant sky shining off and on. and now my story begins in all earnesty. i am, i think a man's man. i do not fear much on this earth, yet what i was about to have happen to me, being mentally unprepared, would change my way of thinking and/or life forever! i grabbed my binoculars, wallet, and a 9mm pistol i had, not wanting to leave them in the van. i put my pistol in my waist holster, and my coat on to step out into the road to view what i thought was a helicopter, about 3/4 to 1 mile away over the dark treeline. as i couldn't quite make out the lights flashing on this object too well, i walked down the road to where it curbs about 70 yards from the van. the road heads out to my left towards the communication tower mentioned earlier, behind me it ends at some rocky bluffs that people like to fish alot from, towards hw 13 out of clinton, mo. when i focused my nikon 8x40 binoculars on the object again, with and without my glasses, i could just make out what appeared to be a dish like form, a red flashing light on the middle top, and what looked like strobe lights flasing in the middle of the object in a circular and uniform manner. i could not hear any sound at that distance, but looking at the object and judging its movement if any, against the dark tree line, i came to the conclusion it was hovering and/or stationary. i did think this was odd for a helicopter to be in that area and no sound whatsoever. and in that frame of mind, all i was doing was wondering what could be the purpose. little knowing that my quiet evening was to take a sci-fi turn out of a movie! as i was just standing watching this object, i happened to look to my left, down that section of county road, possibly 1/4 mile in length and was shocked to see a blue like, lazer beam of light come from the sw horizen and make a 90 degree drop straight down to the earth, which seemed to be at the end of the road i was standing on. standing on mind you! i may have not put as much thought into what the disk like object i was looking at seconds ago, to be no more than some sort of man made craft, helicopter, etc, but this lazer light as you can guess, made me take a very profound interest in what was happening around me in the star filled, cold, dark heavens! i gazed intently in the direction of that beam of light which made no sound, yet didn't see anything. i then put my binoculars on the disk like object and saw that it was still in the same area and still flashing its lights the same as before. after what seemed like 5 minutes, out of the corner of my left eye, another blueish lazer beam of light appeared from the same area of the horizon from the sw as the 1st beam, and in the blink of an eye it stopped halfway down the road, above the tree line next to the road i was standing in. i can only describe this orb as one might say to be somewhat egg shaped,fuzzy in color, white around the edge, with a pilot flame like bluish tint of color, taking up 80% of the middle diameter. the hair went up on my neck and head as it very slowly, yet quietly, seem to be floating down the tree line towards me! i seemed to instantly forget that i had a fully loaded 9mm pistol in the back of my waist! i was very proficient with this firearm, yet the fear that seemed to overcome me made me even lose touch with the very ground i stood on. i was as one might say, reveted in place. i quickly looked back at the disk and it was still there, doing the same thing as before. in turning quickly back to watch the orb float towards me down the tree line, i tried to judge its size by taking my hand and encircling it with my fingers. i judged it to be at arms length about the size of a golf ball or slightly larger. in the process of doing this i also judged the height above to treeline to what one might think as 40 ft.Or so. i cannot safely say that this orb was directly over the tree line or just behind it. but it was in full view. after getting this info in my head, it had closed the distance to me by more than halfway. by then it looked to be the size of a baseball! to say i was getting worried is an unearthly understatement! then out of the same sw horizon, another lazer like beam, and a 2nd orb lines up directly behind the first orb! possibly 100 ft. or so apart. they both are floating along silently still coming towards me. as they near the end of the tree line, the curve i am standing in has a field road cutting into a grown up field that lays across their path, this i am nearly facing, although slightly to the left, as i am understandably watching their immenant progress towards me. all of a sudden, in the blink of an eye, the 2nd orb behind the 1st orb, drops down underneath and is directly lined up as if tied together, both silently coming on. i cup my ears and hear nothing, no humming, nothing! as they both cross the opening directly across from me, an incredibly bright, neon green, "v" shaped light seems to light up the star filled night sky where i had no view of anything but that light in that split second. in that light i just snapped a photo in my minds eye, was what seemed to look like a unbroken smoke ring, much as a feather would look like descending to the ground. how anyone could not possibly see this from hw 13 over the grand river arm of the lake is beyond me. but in that light i did not see either of the orbs. but as soon as the light was gone, what i assumed to be the 1st orb was slowly continuing that same path over the treeline to my right. it started to slightly veer upwards at a 45 degree angle and as it was in the direction as the disk further away, which i had not looked at for obvious reasons, i took a quick look and the disk shaped object was moving away over the far tree line in the general direction of clinton,mo. much the speed as a helicopter would. as i then looked back and up at the orb it was still at a 45 degree angle and all at once, like the starship enterprise of tv fame, it left in the only way i can see and think it! (in warp drive) to infinity and beyond! a blue lazer like tail, with the orb at the front, which move so quickly, that the tail was taken along with it and it looked to take its place in the stars of the universe and become a star! that is the only way i can describe how fast it moved and how long i saw it.

after watching and going thru all of this, what seemed to be an afterthought was that next to that 2nd tree line to my right was a parked, datson like truck with a camper shell on it. i never noticed this before or fully forgot about it as the night sky was filled with these happenings! i was hoping someone was there in that area with me and had maybe viewed the same things i had. i was truly hoping that i wasn't by myself out there as i had this feeling after the bright neon green light filled the night sky, something had landed. how far away, i had no idea! maybe someone was sleeping in the truck, in the back of the bed. i told myself to stay calm and go to the truck and look around, and if i saw them in the cab, as i had a small mini-mag light, to light my way to them to show i was there. but what if there was no one there? i eased up to the cab, covered the light just enough to look inside, and saw blaze orange apparel and a hunting rifle. could this person have gone into town with friends? was he sleeping in the back? i took a chance hoping i wouldn't be thought of as someone out to rob them or do some other mischeif, and called out quietly to ask if any one was in the truck! a 2nd time, no response. damn my luck! it was then that i knew i wasn't myself. i did not have control of my emotions. i knew what i had to say, and as i used the light to tap on the bed of the truck, i heard someone stir. then a man asked me what i wanted? i at first, tried to tell him that i wasn't drinking, nor smoking weed, but there was something happening out here in the sky, and i would like him to look with me, to prove to myself that it had happened as i saw it, if it was to keep on happening. i could not talk straight to him. my words came jumbled and run together out of my mouth, i was shaking like a leaf! it was fear! never had i ever experianced that kind of emotion! i can still think of that moment and relive those thoughts today. albeit with less intensity. the man came out, i cannot remember his name, and talked with me, and we watched the sky for over an hour, but the lights were gone. it took that long and possibly longer talking with him, to feel myself actually touch the ground again. i know not his name, nor ever saw him again, but will always be thankful he was there to calm me down. he mentioned he flew back in the 50's and/or 60's and he and his co-pilot would see things as ufo's, but not go thru the trouble of reporting as it would cause them problems with the airline they flew for. and that is the end of my story. i hope it will be usefull to others, and the only thing i would like to see is for someone to put on video what i saw and let others see and/or relive what i or they might have seen also!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A disk, 2 orbs, and a laser light show!!!!!!

content.detailedDescription:
Tonight we saw more of the star like objects, two were flying south, and one was flying north. but this time was a little more unusual, after the last object went out of sight this rotating craft just appeared out in the eastern part of the sky. we would say it was rotating by the light sequence, it was blinking with out a pattern. there was one solid red light on the craft and you could tell it was rotating around the craft. the other light colors were white and blue. this rotating craft was chasing the star like objects we would say by the way it was moving. it appeared out of no where and made no noise what so ever.
     also while i was writing this to you my nephew was out looking in the sky and saw two more rotating crafts and he also saw a very large bright light appear right above the trees and zoom across the sky at a rapid rate of speed. he said that the light appeared right above the trees and just take off.
     like i said before why are they picking my back yard to play around in? we are starting to get alarmed. not knowing what something is, is a very un easy feeling. it seems like every night something more seems to happen. we have tried a digital camera to capture these events and nothing would show up. but they do sometimes respond to my flash light. i know this sounds crazy but i took my mag light and flashed it up in the sky 3 quick times and more star like objects took off. almost like they responded to my flashes. we just do not know what to do.
content.summary: I am still seeing more objects in my back yard.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out on working, helping my buddy with his delivery route. we had just left a stop, and were heading east on lpga to our next stop. it was a clear night out, full moon, stars brightly shining. as we were driving, i have a habit of looking at the stars or the moon, and this time, i looked out to my right, and i seen something i had never seen before in the 20 years i have lived here in daytona beach. to my right, about a quarter mile or so away, hovering over the tree tops, i would estimate about 100-150 foot off the ground, was this large triangle shaped ufo with white lights coming from the 3 corners,(1 on each corner). and in the middle of the ufo was a white/red strobing light, like a conventional airplane would have on its wing tips for safety. i was sitting there thinking as we were driving down the road "what the hell is that???". so as we were approaching our next stop, i kept my eyes on the ufo, to see which way it was heading, and it appeared to be heading west south west away from us, as we were driving east. so i kept my eyes on it until i could see it no more, and i noticed on the back of the ufo, what appeared to be 3 blue ion pulse drives. only reason i am calling them blue ion pulse drives is because of how they were setup on the back of the ufo, or what i assume was the back of the ufo. they were 3 seperated engines, each glowing blue, evenly layed out across the back. 

when i first seen it, i knew it was no airplane, because the local airport is not opened at this time of the night to commercial airplanes, and student pilots do not usually fly that far away from the airport for night training. 

not sure why i looked that far right that night, but i did, and i was very surprised by what i saw. i wish i would see it again so i can get some video or a picture of it. 

i am unsure if the person i was with seen it or not, but i know what i saw, and i have made a rough sketch on our delivery paperwork. i find there is no way this to have been a light glare or reflection of any kind, because i rolled my window down when i seen the ufo, and it was still there when my window was rolled down...

i have attached a map, to give you better idea of where i was compared to the ufo. locations on it are approx and to the best that i can personally rememeber.
content.summary: Triangle ufo with lights.

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside my home in the woods on 8/25/2011 at about 9:30 pm.  i looked up to the north west and saw a super bright star, or at least at first thought it was a star. i started watching it because i hadent seen one that bright before. it had red, blue, green, white,and gold flashing lights going around it, repeating then random flashing in different order. it had a bright white starlight center. i watched this for about 15 min, it seemed to hover in the sky and stayed in one area  it was far away and the other stars look small in compairason. i see alot of odd lights in the sky.. because of where i live.. that i have thought might be unexplainable but for the first time i know i saw a ufo. with out question it was amazing. i now know for sure we are not alone. i went to get banok's. 1 min it was gone.
content.summary: I live in the woods, saw a bright what i thought was a  star. at closer observaction i realize it was not moving,but staying in one spot

content.detailedDescription:
Standing on the patio i notice a large triangular formation of lights traveling from 110 degrees east to 270 degrees west at an alarmingly slow rate of speed. over the coarse of one minute i watched the vehicle travel across my back yard at at impossibly slow speed for a typical aircraft. the vehicle was silent as it passed by under the clouds until it was nearly out of site. at that time i could hear a faint roar. a plane this size flying this low would have been extremely loud and most likely would have been heard coming and going. the object had three distinct sets of lights which seemed to be on three corners of the craft. all three sets of lights were in pattern as such below and flashed in a back and forth pattern with a slight curve to them as if the traced around a rounded corner.

  ..............
  ..............

i would say the lights would resemble the red lights on the front of the night rider firebird a.K.A kit. however these light were much longer and and as mentioned above white and red.

i know this was not a conventional airplane. it just didn't add up. i can assure you my husband and i are very curious as to what this was and would loved to know if there were any other sightings in the area on the date in question. we have found some evidence of a ufo around the same time in laredo texas.
content.summary: Triangle three sets of light all sets red and white

content.detailedDescription:
June 23, 2011 -while visiting relatives in nashville, tn, we went to the parthenon replica in centennial park. after leaving the parthenon, i shot a digital photo from the passenger's seat. i did not notice anything unusual until i looked at the photo on my laptop. to the right, over the power lines, there is a grayish/blackish teardrop shaped object, that fades out on one end.

that same night, about 40 miles away, in portland, tn, i was shooting digital photos outside, at night. (i had been taking photos every night, trying to capture anything paranormal, as the area has a lot of civil 
war history. incidentally, i did get a lot of orbs on camera and possibly 2 apparitions, as well as a video of a chair moving, inside the octagon hall civil war museum.)

anyway, again i didn't notice anything unusual with my eyes. when i looked at the photos on the laptop, i saw an object that could possibly be the same object photographed earlier, from a different angle.

i am uploading both photos and am very interested in what you think they could be.
thanks.
content.summary: Digital pic taken from moving car= teardrop shape over power lines & that night about 40 miles away 2nd pic  of possible same object.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting with my girlfriend in my front yard overlooking the largest corn field on the edge of ottumwa. we were facing the east and the night was clear with no moon. we were stargazing and noticed a light seem to appear out of nowhere and it was moving right at a slow pace. it was bright like an orb of light. about 3 times brighter than jupiter which was also in our field of view. it seemed more like a spotlight at first. when it was moving the light was dimming until we could barely see it until it was gone. this lasted about 12 seconds and it moved about 10 inches in the sky before it was gone. as soon as it wasn't visible, another one appeared in the exact same spot that the first one appeared. it was like an exact replay of the first event. very bright at first and faded the same way on the same path. exactly the same as the first. no sound and no colors of light except bright white. this isn't the first time we have viewed white orbs of light in the sky in our area. this summer we have witnessed over 20 in our area. this was the most convincing one. with my girlfriend included i have i have 6 witnesses to these spheres of bright white light. alot of them fade out when directly overhead or when i signal them with a bright flashlight.
content.summary: 2  bright lights forming from nowhere and fading out in exact same path one after the other.

content.detailedDescription:
on 25.07.2011 i was camping in wiltshire uk, tan hill (294m above sea level). i like studying crop circle and observe a sky. that evening at around 9pm i saw bright light in the sky. was too early for any stars to be visible, and this light was looking brighter than any planet. first i thought it was a airplane. i grabbed my camera and zoomed in to the object. 

tho having small display on my sony hdr-sr10e camcorder, and after i zoomed in, i have realised that this was a disk like shaped object, tilted at around 45��� of its horizontal axes, with a soft "wobbly blinking" like light around. this object was solid and light was only as an extra aura like around. 

gradually this object was traveling to the right and after few minutes it begun to fade out. when this light and an object has shrink, i still saw random blinking of its light, and it looked like as it was taking its last breath before has disappeared from my view. 

it wasn't a first time when i film or photograph ufo's, but this one was in the sky for the longest time i ever saw. i was exited and happy to be where i am, and my adrenaline scale has jumped to the top. 

at the time i did not suspected it was just a beginning of a light show i saw that evening. 5 minutes later, another light has appeared in sky. i zoomed in tho the second object which was about 30 km left from the previous one. this light was pretty much at the same hight, but it was much brighter and chaotically blinking. at some point this light becomes so bright that i was unable to see any solid physical shape behind. tho at some point it become less bright and disk like object was visible again and like the first one, was tilted at around 45��� of its horizontal axes as well. 

english is not my first language and as i am writing i am loosing a grip on expressing my self well. feeling kind of emotional and maybe will stop this letter for now. tho i wouldn't like to run away without finishing my story, so will try to make it shorter. 

later on, these lights wore back in the sky in the same and / or different location, but all wore almost at the same hight. some of them wore on for longer time and some just for a minute. on numerous occasion i saw more than one object / light at the time. there was like one main bright light and few smaller lights wore blinking and / or floating around. 

it was around midnight when all this light show has finished. i don't know how to describe my feelings at the time, but sure it wasn't ordinary. 

those lights wore for so long in the sky so that i had a time to film them using regular, night vision and supper night vision camera options. 

i have posted and you can see short vide of this event on youtube 
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=9ldy68yyaac
hope you like it.
content.summary: More than one object was observed during 3 hours.
